title: Can't post a comment
body:
I wanted to be part of NA comunity and post on NA Boards, see the most recently news and give my feedback directly to the admins, i've created a NA account, but I still couldn't post because my account would need level 10, so I've spent a lot of time leveling up the account just to post comments here, i've been playing over 30 games with 170+ ms just to put the account at level 10.
Now that i've reached the achieve i noticed that i can't comment on "Dev Corner" because my account isn't level 12.
**What is the purpose of that?**

I will need to play like 10 more games to reach that :(

replies.body: Those level requirements are essentially there to help protect the community so that certain boards keep their level of visibility. If any level were able to post in Dev Corner, a lot of the Official Riot posts might be hidden by a number of random player posts.
